metadata.Title: CVE-2017-20148 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: In the ebuild package through logcheck-1.3.23.ebuild for Logcheck onGentoo, it is possible to achieve root privilege escalation from thelogcheck user because of insecure recursive chown calls.

criterions.comment: logcheck: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
